title: BORK reworked into a bruiser item
body:
blade of the Ruined King
AD increased from 25 to 45
Attack speed lowered from 40% to 25%
Lifesteal increased from 10% to 15%
Unique Active changed
[removed] "Steals 10% of target champion's maximum Health (min. 100) as physical damage, heals for the same amount,"

I feel like AD increased on 45 is a buff to many bruisers who don't need attack speed

replies.body:
Yeah... not sure how I really feel about this item. On the plus side, it does more damage on hit and heals more on hit but... the attack speed and active burst kind of gave it that nice niche spot though.
Will have to test in game but it looks like a hybrid of new and past iterations of Bork, though boasting much better stats overall than previous iterations. 

The real question now is... if it gets released like this, how much will it cost in game to purchase?
yes, my fiora game needs this
